game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifacts from the lost temple.
game.description: The temple has been hidden for centuries, and the artifacts within hold the secrets of a long-lost civilization. Find them before they fall into the wrong hands.

tasks.objective: Find the entrance to the lost temple
tasks.description: The temple is hidden deep in the nearby forest. Look for the ancient stone path that leads to it.
tasks.location: Forest of Elvendom, north of the village

tasks.description: Inside the temple, you'll find a chamber filled with treasure. Find the golden idol on top of the pedestal.
tasks.location: The Lost Temple, Chamber of Gold

tasks.objective: Return to Gorvoth with the Golden Idol
tasks.description: Once you have the idol, return it to Gorvoth in the village. He'll be waiting for you.
